item.title: Watch Live: Trump announces deployment of National Guard to D.C.
item.description: President Trump on Monday announced he has taken control of local law enforcement in Washington, D.C., and will deploy members of the National Guard.

item.title: Al Jazeera journalist Anas al-Sharif and 4 team members killed in Gaza
item.description: Israel's military targeted and killed five Al Jazeera journalists in Gaza on Sunday, including Al Jazeera correspondent Anas al-Sharif.

item.title: Flooding inundates Midwest as storms cut power, kill at least 1
item.description: Flash flooding hit several Midwestern states over the weekend, submerging cars in Milwaukee and killing at least one person in eastern Nebraska, offic...

item.title: Tropical Storm Erin forms, could become Atlantic's first hurricane this season
item.description: Tropical Storm Erin could strengthen to become the Atlantic's first hurricane of the season.

item.title: Divorce expert Christina McGhee explains "bird nesting"
